```{r}
reactable::reactable(infert)
reactable::reactable(iris)
```

## plot 1
```{r}
women <- plot(women)
ggplotly(women)
```

## plot 2
```{r}
colplot <- iris %>%
  group_by(Species) %>% 
  summarise(avgSepLeng = mean(Sepal.Length)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = avgSepLeng, x = Species, fill = Species)) +
  geom_col()

ggplotly(colplot)
```

## plot 3
```{r}
denplot <- iris %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Sepal.Length, fill = Species, colour = Species)) +
  geom_density(alpha = 0.5)

ggplotly(denplot)
```

:::
